thread.title: Tottenham vs KAA Gent, Europa League: What time is kick-off, what TV channel is it on and what is our prediction?
thread.title_full: Tottenham vs KAA Gent, Europa League: What time is kick-off, what TV channel is it on and what is our prediction?

author: Telegraph Sport
title: Tottenham vs KAA Gent, Europa League: What time is kick-off, what TV channel is it on and what is our prediction?
text:
What is it? I t's the Europa League last-32 second leg clash between Tottenham and KAA Gent.
The two teams met last week, Spurs lost 1-0, and you can read about it here .
When is it? It's on Thursday February 23 - ie tonight!
What time is kick-off? 20.05 GMT.
What TV channel is it on? It depends on the quality of picture you are after: BT Sport 2, BT Sport 2 HD and BT Sport 4K UHD.
Who is the deadliest scorer in Europe? What is the team news? T ottenham: 
Tottenham youngsters Marcus Edwards and Kyle Walker-Peters both trained with the first team on Wednesday but Mauricio Pochettino is not expected to make many changes.
Erik Lamela has begun running again as he continues his recovery from a hip problem but the club said Danny Rose remains "a number of weeks away from full training".
It places in doubt the full-back's availability for England's friendly against Germany in four weeks' time.
"I hope he will be good for that but I cannot say anything more," Pochettino said. "We don't know. It's too difficult to say."
Pick your Tottenham team for tonight What are they saying? 
T ottenham boss Mauricio Pochettino: 
"We cannot buy time, that is the most important thing for us," he said.
"You never know in football, but in a short period you cannot do it - only if you have money enough to buy the best players in the world. Then you maybe don't need much time.
"But the process we are in and with our philosophy we need time. We are showing a good basis but now it's time to develop the winning mentality."
What are the odds? Tottenham - 1/3 KAA Gent - 12/1 Draw - 24/5 What's our prediction? We're backing Tottenham to secure a 2-0 win and make it through to the last-16.
